description: A fully object-oriented approach to JSON manipulation, validation, and serialization that focuses on modeling the JSON structure rather than mere string parsing.
releaseNotes:
See Trello board for this project at https://trello.com/b/bQ7Io1z9/manatee-json.  Feedback is welcome through the board, on StackOverflow, or by emailing littlecrabsolutions@yahoo.com.

If you use this library for a business, you can let the world know on the aforementioned Trello board.

v2.7.3.2
Added support for Mono.

v2.7.3.1
BUG FIX: Numeric deserialization failing for non-"en-US" cultures.

v2.7.3
Added template generation to JsonSerializer.  Creates a JSON template with default values using the settings of the serializer.
Added serializer registration of array types.

v2.7.2
Added serialization of DateTime objects with custom formatting.
Added the ability to map open generic abstraction types to open generic concrete types.
BUG FIX: Nested default values don't serialize, even when EncodeDefaultValues is true.
BUG FIX: JSONPath expression cannot accept star (*) after '.length' operator during parsing

v2.7.1
Added serializer option to include public fields.
Added missing XML comments.

v2.7.0
Vastly expanded error reporting.
Updated JsonSerializationRegistry to accept a serializer as a parameter so that contained items can be serialized using the same instance and options.
BUG FIX: JsonPath length expression causes exception.
BUG FIX: JsonPath subexpressions not parsing or printing correctly.
title: Manatee.Json
